1.Title: Dazzling Entrance
1.Description: When Billy hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.
1.Lore:
"You guys are way too honest to be bad guys!"
"All lined up, like NPCs at the shooting range!"

2.Title: Roaming Gunslinger
2.Description: Billy's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 25%. Rolling Shots during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> count as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during skill activation and able to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodges</color>. When a Rolling Shot triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, it will automatically follow up with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.
2.Lore:
"The Starlight Knights never run from danger. That's what we call tactical repositioning for better aim!"
— User "Dreamgirl Monica" from the Starlight Radiance messageboards.

3.Title: Teachings of the Starlight Knights
3.Lore: Never neglect your training, and never stop improving! This is the philosophy of the Starlight Knights. Billy believes in it wholeheartedly, and practices it sincerely.

4.Title: Starlight Ballistics
4.Description: When Billy hits an enemy with his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the skill's CRIT Rate increases based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.
4.Lore:
These explosive bullets of Billy's own invention are incredibly lethal at close range.
Their performance far outstrips Billy's original intention of simply making them cooler.

5.Title: Lost Technological Construct
5.Lore: Unknown precision components and unique structural design have given Billy performance far beyond his peers... And maintenance costs far beyond his means.

6.Title: Starlight Hero
6.Description: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
6.Lore:
"Hooboy~ Feelin' great! Move aside, Anby, it's my time to shine!"
"Yo, Anby — can you play the Starlight Knight theme?"
—excerpt from Cunning Hares' "Top 10 Forbidden Sentences," selected by Anby

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Team Starlight
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the DMG of his next <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> is activated.

108100001.Title: Basic Attack: Full Firepower
108100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes a piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Repeatedly press or hold to enter Crouching Shot to extend the attack duration.
Drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during Crouching Shot to launch Rolling Shot and adjust the character's position, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Stop pressing or holding during Crouching Shot to launch Finishing Shot at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

108100002.Title: Special Attack: Stand Still
108100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Performs up to 3 piercing attacks in a line, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

108100003.Title: EX Special Attack: Clearance Time
108100003.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Launches a powerful piercing attack in a line, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100004.Title: Dodge: Risky Business
108100004.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100005.Title: Dash Attack: Starlight Sanction
108100005.Description:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Launches a piercing attack at nearby enemies within a large area, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When not dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during a dodge, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal>:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in a line, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

108100006.Title: Dodge Counter: Fair Fight
108100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100007.Title: Chain Attack: Starlight Mirage
108100007.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100008.Title: Ultimate: Starlight, Shine Bright
108100008.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100010.Title: Quick Assist: Power of Teamwork
108100010.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100011.Title: Evasive Assist: Flash Spin
108100011.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

108100012.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Fatal Shot
108100012.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in a large area in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
